p: An ethanolic (30 ml) solution of 5-pentadecyl-1,3,4-oxadiazole-2(3 H)-thione ( Int-iii, 3.26 g, 0.01 mol) and hydrazine hydrate (0.38 g, 0.01 mol) was heated under reflux for 3 h and then solution was poured in ice. The resulting product was filtered, washed and recrystallized from ethanol [ 26, 27].
